messages.message:
Encountering an error that *only occurs when running our Webpack-bundled tests*. I'm unable to reproduce this issue through manual testing in the UI, where the application behaves as expected. Please see the attached screenshot for the specific error message.

Any help is appreciated.
Ah, I see, let me try
I did that, Now I seem to be getting no queryClient set.
Does this test fail on master as well?
OK. Likely your feature branch added some extra dependencies to the component the test is testing. You need to mock out those extra dependencies
